carbon.widget

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • android.widget.Button
          • carbon.widget.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, AnimatedView, RippleView, ShadowView, AutoSizeTextView, CornerView, RevealView, StateAnimatorView, StrokeView, TintedView, TouchMarginView, VisibleView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckBox, RadioButton

    public class Button
extends android.widget.Button
implements ShadowView, RippleView, TouchMarginView, StateAnimatorView, AnimatedView, CornerView, TintedView, StrokeView, AutoSizeTextView, RevealView, VisibleView
    Carbon version of android.widget.Button. Supports shadows, ripples, animations and all other material features.

      • setAllCaps

        public void setAllCaps(boolean allCaps)
        Changes text transformation method to caps.
        Overrides:
        setAllCaps in class android.widget.TextView

      • setAutoSizeStepGranularity

        public void setAutoSizeStepGranularity(float autoSizeStepGranularity)
        Description copied from interface: AutoSizeTextView
        Sets automatic text size granularity. Text can only take values which are equal to minSize * [0 to N] * granularity or maxSize. This parameter helps to keep automatic text sizes count low and easy to predict. Setting granularity to a larger value speeds up the adjustment process.
        Specified by:
        setAutoSizeStepGranularity in interface AutoSizeTextView
        Parameters:
        autoSizeStepGranularity - granularity
